pullrequest.title: Update Wind Plugin to support being used by Lift Drag Plugin

content.raw:
Changes look good to me. 

Just one note: it changes existing plugin behavior so we may want to either:

1. update the [Migration](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/8a59b5f0f0b9bda21ee905098b47900da492ba9c/Migration.md?at=default) guide about the change to default behavior in WindPlugin and make a note about the new `force_approximation_scaling_factor` sdf element.  

1. set `force_approximation_scaling_factor` default value to 1.0 to maintain compatibility, and let poeple wanting to this plugin with `LiftDragPlugin` add the `force_approximation_scaling_factor` sdf element themselves.  

I can make the change when we agree on which option to take.
content.html:
Changes look good to me.

Just one note: it changes existing plugin behavior so we may want to either:

  1. update the Migration guide about the change to default behavior in WindPlugin and make a note about the new force_approximation_scaling_factor sdf element.

  2. set force_approximation_scaling_factor default value to 1.0 to maintain compatibility, and let poeple wanting to this plugin with LiftDragPlugin add the force_approximation_scaling_factor sdf element themselves.

I can make the change when we agree on which option to take.
